thread.title: 'Stranger Things' Star Finn Wolfhard Doesn't Get Why Clowns Exist
thread.title_full: 'Stranger Things' Star Finn Wolfhard Doesn't Get Why Clowns Exist | TMZ.com

author: TMZ Staff
title: 'Stranger Things' Star Finn Wolfhard Doesn't Get Why Clowns Exist
text:
" Stranger Things " star Finn Wolfhard paints a horrific picture when it comes to clowns.
The kid actor just finished wrapping the horror flick " It " -- an adaptation of Stephen King's novel -- and explained Thursday at LAX why he's just not about that clown life.
He's probably got a point.
